name: Pinball Mayhem
description:
I worked on the boss and general code, building within the engine, and background assets.

Arijit was the main sound artist.

Jesse created most of the art.

Joaquin worked on general coding and building within the engine.

Parker worked on general coding and building within the engine.

Toine designed the levels.

Crystal was the primary coder of the pinball flippers and building within the engine.
